title: I hope we get an option to keep legacy client
body:
after the new one is out of beta
Some things I hope carry onto the new client
1. Masteries & Runes (old ones were so much cleaner looking & easier to navigate, having to click the dropdown button then a mastery page is extremely annoying)
2. Ability to minimize friends list (it's annoying to look at all that text & it shrinks the display area for everything else
3. No comments after getting a key (the "Congratulations TheOneUser, blah blah blah" is both cheesy & creepy and I just want my key)
4. Profile to show stats (wins, cs, kills, ranked stats, etc)

Otherwise, I like all the other new options!

replies.body:
They've said that once they finished patching it with features and sorted out the horrible performance, it will take over legacy client, or something like that.

So the short answer for this question is a No.
